entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of showers overnight with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 20. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
